comment: This teacher is extremely picky. If you are not already a teacher please don't take her. Her expectations are overkill !!!! I think this is her first go at teaching and she is trying desperately to impress the KSU's school system and her staff. Don't say I didn't warn you!!!

Dr. Crowder was a nice person, but as a professor she could use a lot of improvement. We always sat in her class for 3 hours with no breaks, as she would read off the slides. There were many awkward moments where we would all just stare at each other. She also would change the rubrics on us after we had already submitted assignments.
Three weeks in and I wish I took someone else. do not do it. Reads from powerpoint for the entire class. Strict attendance policy. Nothing is clear.
We had extremely awkward moments. I am not sure what Tuba is going to improve her instruction. But apparently, she has a lot to work on. I would def. avoid taking anything with her.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Test heavy

comment: Is an awkward person. Very rude. Doesn't know how to communicate assignments. Will stare at you until you answer a question.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Test heavy--Group projects

comment: I am really surprised too see such bad reviews for Tuba. Yes, her lectures are boring but its a great time to get things done for other classes. The "classwork" she gives you don't actually have to do it because she never takes anything up. Its a very easy class and she is an easy graders. I would deff recommend taking her!

DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR! Yes, I got an A in the course, but I had to attend 3 hour long lectures with a teacher who stood in front of the room and rambled with a PowerPoint in the background. In-class assignments were never graded. I had to explain to my CT why I had no idea what I was supposed to be doing, because Tuba doesn't answer questions.
She gives so much work and doesn't explain anything. She is very unclear with her directions. Her due dates are also not clear. Don't take her!
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: This professor was brand new to KSU when I had her and it showed!!! She had no idea what was going on and her lecturers were LONG and BORING. Ask her a question? She answers a different question. Assignments aren't difficult though.. only reason why I would take her again. Class was painfully awkward and silent.

Nice person but awful professor. She knows the material she is teaching but doesn't know how to teach. It was hard to sit through a almost three hour class each week. Reads directly from power points and lectures almost the entire class.

Nice professor. However, I would never take her for a class again. All she does is show powerpoints and videos and assign the same type of group work activity, every single class. Most boring class ever. VERY strict attendance policy. She is not clear in her instructions for assignments. Easy assignments, nice professor but super boring & unclear
